c74object.name: sy.rev
c74object.description: Reverses the order of characters in incoming symbols.

method.name: anything
method.description: Each incoming symbol is reversed, i.e. its characters are read right-to-left. Unless global is set to 0, also the atoms of the incoming list are reversed. Finally, the result is output.

method.name: bang
method.description: Perform the reversal on the most recently received input symbols.
